nodes.text: Corellian Corporate Council Tower was the headquarters of the Corellian Corporate Council, located in the Incorporation Islands of the Coronet City on Corellia. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY, a bounty hunter stormed the tower to retrieve the head of the council Chairman Harlon Fane for Darth Tormen.
Corellian Corporate Council Tower appears as an area on Corellia in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
